TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComboBox extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector

summary.span: 表示带有下拉列表的选择控件，通过单击控件上的箭头可显示或隐藏下拉列表。

span.span: Represents a selection control with a drop-down list that can be shown or hidden by clicking the arrow on the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 允许用户从下拉列表中选择项，或根据需要在控件的文本框中输入新文本。The allows the user to select an item from a drop-down list or optionally to enter new text in the text box of the control. 是 ，这意味着它可以包含任何类型的对象（如字符串、图像或面板）的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 和 属性指定用户执行以下操作之一时 的行为：The and properties specify how the behaves when the user does one of the following: - 输入用于在 中选择项的字符串。Enters a string to select an item in the . - 输入不与 中的项对应的字符串。Enters a string that does not correspond to an item in the . - 选择文本框中的字符串的一部分。Selects part of the string that is in the text box. - 将值复制或粘贴到文本框中。Copies or pastes a value into the text box. 下表描述了用户可以和不可以执行的操作，具体取决于 和 的值。The following table describes the actions the user can and cannot take, depending on the values of and . || 为 `true` is `true`| 为 `false` is `false`| |-|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | 为 `true` is `true`|-无法通过输入字符串在 中选择项。- Cannot select an item in the by entering a string.
-不能输入与 中的项不对应的字符串。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-可以选择 "" 文本框中的部分字符串。- Can select part of the string in the text box.
-可以复制 "" 文本框中的字符串，但不能将字符串粘贴到 "" 文本框中。- Can copy the string in the text box, but cannot paste a string into the text box.|-可通过输入字符串在 中选择一个项。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-可以输入与 中的项不对应的字符串。- Can enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-可以选择 "" 文本框中的部分字符串。- Can select part of the string in the text box.
-可以复制或粘贴 文本框中的字符串。- Can copy or paste the string in the text box.| | 为 `false` is `false`|-可通过输入字符串在 中选择一个项。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-不能输入与 中的项不对应的字符串。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-无法在 中选择部分字符串。- Cannot select part of the string in the .
-无法复制或粘贴 中的字符串。- Cannot copy or paste the string in the .|-可通过输入字符串在 中选择一个项。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-不能输入与 中的项不对应的字符串。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-无法在 中选择部分字符串。- Cannot select part of the string in the .
-无法复制或粘贴 中的字符串。- Cannot copy or paste the string in the .| 仅当 `true`时， 属性才有效果。The property has an effect only if is `true`. 是 ，因此它可以显示简单字符串以外的内容。The is an , so it can display content other than simple strings. 例如，可以创建包含映像列表的 。For example, you can create a that contains a list of images. 如果 中的字符串不是字符串，则隐藏下拉列表时，可能会在 中出现过程字符串。When you have content other than strings in the , a nonsensical string might appear in the when the drop-down list is hidden. 若要在包含非字符串项的 中显示字符串，请使用 或 附加属性。To display a string in the when it contains non-string items, use the or attached property. ## 自定义 ComboBox 控件Customizing the ComboBox Control 若要对多个 控件应用相同的属性设置，请使用 属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认 以使控件具有独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建 的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看特定于 的部分和状态，请参阅[ComboBox 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/combobox-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ComboBox Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/combobox-styles-and-templates.md). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 。The following example creates a . 该示例通过将 属性绑定到类型 `VacationSpots`的集合对象来填充 。The example populates the by binding the property to a collection object of type `VacationSpots`. 该示例还创建 ，用于显示 的选定项。The example also creates a that displays the selected item of the . [!code-xaml[ComboBoxItems#ComboBoxClass](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxItems/CSharp/Window1.xaml#comboboxclass)] 下面的示例定义了前面的示例中的 将绑定到的集合对象。The following example defines the collection object that the in the preceding example binds to. [!code-csharp[ComboBoxItems#Data](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxItems/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#data)] [!code-vb[ComboBoxItems#Data](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxItems/VIsualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#data)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件在其样式中具有 并且具有自定义键盘滚动行为，则 应返回 `true`。If the control has a in its style and has a custom keyboard scrolling behavior, should return `true`.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 和 属性指定用户执行以下操作之一时 的行为：The and properties specify how the behaves when the user does one of the following: - 输入用于在 中选择项的字符串。Enters a string to select an item in the . - 输入不与 中的项对应的字符串。Enters a string that does not correspond to an item in the . - 选择文本框中的字符串的一部分。Selects part of the string that is in the text box. - 将值复制或粘贴到文本框中。Copies or pastes a value into the text box. 下表描述了用户可以和不可以执行的操作，具体取决于 和 的值。The following table describes the actions the user can and cannot take, depending on the values of and . || 为 `true` is `true`| 为 `false` is `false`| |-|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | 为 `true` is `true`|-无法通过输入字符串在 中选择项。- Cannot select an item in the by entering a string.
-不能输入与 中的项不对应的字符串。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-可以选择 "" 文本框中的部分字符串。- Can select part of the string in the text box.
-可以复制 "" 文本框中的字符串，但不能将字符串粘贴到 "" 文本框中。- Can copy the string in the text box, but cannot paste a string into the text box.|-可通过输入字符串在 中选择一个项。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-可以输入与 中的项不对应的字符串。- Can enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-可以选择 "" 文本框中的部分字符串。- Can select part of the string in the text box.
-可以复制或粘贴 文本框中的字符串。- Can copy or paste the string in the text box.| | 为 `false` is `false`|-可通过输入字符串在 中选择一个项。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-不能输入与 中的项不对应的字符串。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-无法在 中选择部分字符串。- Cannot select part of the string in the .
-无法复制或粘贴 中的字符串。- Cannot copy or paste the string in the .|-可通过输入字符串在 中选择一个项。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-不能输入与 中的项不对应的字符串。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-无法在 中选择部分字符串。- Cannot select part of the string in the .
-无法复制或粘贴 中的字符串。- Cannot copy or paste the string in the .| 如果 等于 `false`，则 使用 来显示当前选定的项;如果 等于 `true`，则 用于此目的。When is equal to `false`, the uses a to display the currently selected item; when is equal to `true`, a is used for this purpose instead. 请注意， 仅显示纯文本， 可能包括非纯文本内容（例如图像）。Note that a only displays plain text, and that a may include non-plain text content, such as images. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例创建 控件，这些控件包含图像作为项而不是文本。The following examples create controls that contain images as items instead of text. 如果 属性设置为 `true`，则 将显示图像的 方法返回的值。If the property is set to `true`, the displays the value returned by the image's method. 若要避免 包含意外文本，请使用 和 属性分配要显示的文本。To avoid a with unexpected text, use the and properties to assign text to be displayed. [!code-xaml[ComboBoxProps_snip#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxProps_snip/CS/pane1.xaml#1)] [!code-xaml[ComboBoxProps_snip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxProps_snip/CS/pane1.xaml#2)] 另一种解决方法是使用 属性。Another solution is to use the property. 的下拉控件不会显示图像，但会显示您分配的文本。The drop-down control of the will not display the images but will display the text you assigned. 下面的示例说明如何使用 。The following example shows how to use . [!code-xaml[ComboBoxProps_snip#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxProps_snip/CS/pane1.xaml#3)]

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 和 属性指定用户执行以下操作之一时 的行为：The and properties specify how the behaves when the user does one of the following: - 输入用于在 中选择项的字符串。Enters a string to select an item in the . - 输入不与 中的项对应的字符串。Enters a string that does not correspond to an item in the . - 选择文本框中的字符串的一部分。Selects part of the string that is in the text box. - 将值复制或粘贴到文本框中。Copies or pastes a value into the text box. 下表描述了用户可以和不可以执行的操作，具体取决于 和 的值。The following table describes the actions the user can and cannot take, depending on the values of and . || 为 `true` is `true`| 为 `false` is `false`| |-|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | 为 `true` is `true`|-无法通过输入字符串在 中选择项。- Cannot select an item in the by entering a string.
-不能输入与 中的项不对应的字符串。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-可以选择 "" 文本框中的部分字符串。- Can select part of the string in the text box.
-可以复制 "" 文本框中的字符串，但不能将字符串粘贴到 "" 文本框中。- Can copy the string in the text box, but cannot paste a string into the text box.|-可通过输入字符串在 中选择一个项。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-可以输入与 中的项不对应的字符串。- Can enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-可以选择 "" 文本框中的部分字符串。- Can select part of the string in the text box.
-可以复制或粘贴 文本框中的字符串。- Can copy or paste the string in the text box.| | 为 `false` is `false`|-可通过输入字符串在 中选择一个项。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-不能输入与 中的项不对应的字符串。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-无法在 中选择部分字符串。- Cannot select part of the string in the .
-无法复制或粘贴 中的字符串。- Cannot copy or paste the string in the .|-可通过输入字符串在 中选择一个项。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-不能输入与 中的项不对应的字符串。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-无法在 中选择部分字符串。- Cannot select part of the string in the .
-无法复制或粘贴 中的字符串。- Cannot copy or paste the string in the .| 如果 等于 `false`，则 使用 来显示当前选定的项;如果 等于 `true`，则 用于此目的。When is equal to `false`, the uses a to display the currently selected item; when is equal to `true`, a is used for this purpose instead. 请注意， 仅显示纯文本， 可能包括非纯文本内容（例如图像）。Note that a only displays plain text, and that a may include non-plain text content, such as images. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示具有可编辑 的 。The following example shows a with an editable . 属性设置为 `true`，因此用户无法在 中输入文本。The property is set to `true`, so the user cannot enter text into the . [!code-xaml[ComboBoxItems#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxItems/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSelectionBoxHighlighted As Boolean
public: property bool IsSelectionBoxHighlighted { bool get(); };

summary.span: 确定是否突出显示 。

span.span: Gets whether the is highlighted.

value.span: 如果突出显示 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is highlighted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是一个依赖项属性。This property is a dependency property. 但 的依赖项属性标识符字段不是公共的。However, the dependency property identifier field for is not public. 因此，不能对需要依赖属性标识符的属性系统操作（如对 的调用）使用后备依赖属性。Therefore, you cannot use the backing dependency property for property system operations that require the dependency property identifier, such as calls to . 不过，您仍可以将 用作属性触发器。However, you can still use as a property trigger.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double MaxDropDownHeight { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.MaxDropDownHeight : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置组合框下拉部分的最大高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum height for a combo box drop-down.

value.span: 一个 double 值，该值表示检索到的高度或要设置的高度。

span.span: A double that represents the height that is retrieved or the height to set.

value.span: 为属性系统定义的默认值是根据系统最大屏幕高度参数的三分之一计算得到的，但是此默认值可能会由各种控件模板重写。

span.span: The default value as defined to the property system is a calculated value based on taking a one-third fraction of the system max screen height parameters, but this default is potentially overridden by various control templates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自动调整大小不是默认值，将导致下拉大小可能超出父元素中的可用大小。Auto sizing is not the default, and will result in the drop down size potentially exceeding the available size in the parent element. 通常不需要这样做。This is not typically desirable. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *双精度**double* 值的字符串表示形式。String representation of a value. 这被解释为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] 度量。This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. 例如，`1` 的值是可接受的。For instance a value of `1` is acceptable. "属性值" 一节中提到的 范围限制相同。The same range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* 如上所述的*双精度*值，后跟以下单元声明字符串之一： `px`、`in`、`cm``pt`。A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` （默认值）为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 是厘米;1cm = = （96/2.54） px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = = （96/72） px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px `Auto` 启用自动调整行为。Enables autosizing behavior. 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定 控件下拉控件的高度。The following example shows how to use the property to specify the height of the control's drop-down. [!code-xaml[ComboBoxStyles#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxStyles/CS/app.xaml#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefix { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefix : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指示 是保留用户的输入还是将输入替换为匹配的项的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the keeps the user's input or replaces the input with a matching item.

value.span: 如果 保留用户的输入，则为 ；如果 替换具有匹配项的输入。则为 。注册的默认值是 。

span.span: if the keeps the user's input; if the replaces the input with a matching item The registered default is .

value.span: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅 [Dependency Property Value Precedence（依赖项属性值优先级）](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当用户在与某一项项匹配的 中键入一个字符串时，将选择该项并替换用户键入的文本。By default, when the user types a string into the that matches one of its items, the item is selected and the text that the user typed is replaced. 这可能导致用户输入的文本更改大小写。This can cause the text that the user entered to change case. 如果 属性设置为 `true`，则 将选择匹配项，但会保留用户输入的文本。If the property is set to `true`, the selects the matching item, but preserves the text that the user entered. 例如，假设 包含字符串 "Hello" （带有大写 H），用户输入 "hello" （带有小写 h）。For example, suppose that a contains the string, "Hello" (with a capital H) and the user enters "hello" (with a lowercase h). 如果 `false`，则 会在其集合中选择匹配项 "Hello"，并用该字符串填充其文本框。If is `false`, the selects the matching item, "Hello," in its collection and populates its text box with that string. 如果 `true`，则将从集合中选择 "Hello"，但文本框显示 "hello"。If is `true`, "Hello" is selected from the collection, but the text box says "hello." ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

Public Shared ReadOnly ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefixProperty As DependencyProperty

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 属性创建一个组合框，在用户将信息输入到文本框中时，该组合框的下拉控件保持打开状态。This example shows how to use the property to create a combo box whose drop-down control stays open while the user enters information into the text box. summary.span: 获取或设置当前选定项的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of the currently selected item.

value.span: 当前选定项的字符串。

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true` 属性时，设置此属性将在文本框中输入初始文本。When the property is `true`, setting this property places initial text entered in the text box. `false` 时，设置此值不起作用。When is `false`, setting this value has no effect. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|， , | ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 属性在用户进行选择之前将文本设置到 中。This example shows how the property can be used to set text into the before the user makes a selection.
